name: Runaan's Hurricane

passives.name: Wind's Fury
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-attack]] fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies {{tt|in front of you|180{{degree}}}}, each dealing {{as|55% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}. Bolts apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects and are affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.

effects_structured.raw: Basic attacks [[on-attack]] fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies {{tt|in front of you|180{{degree}}}}, each dealing {{as|55% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}. Bolts apply {{tip|on-hit}} effects and are affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.

simpleDescription: Ranged attacks fire two bolts at nearby enemies
